title: bots in bot games
body: so i know bot games have bots right, i realized that recently whenever i played a bot game there is always 1 player on my team who just intentionally feeds the bots. They come with different names and never reply, so i got curious and checked their profile and they were lvl 30 and heve no masteries or runes or champions. They only use free champs. Is this like riots doing or whats going on because this happens every bot game now. Someone told me that riot puts intentional feeding bots in our team to make the game harder so i was curious to know. P.S. i play bot games if i am lagging so don't judge :P

replies.body: Its people leveling accounts/farming ip with bot scripts so they are basically bots themselves, if they do it in beginner bots its no issue but intermediate it might be if you have a few of them and the rest of the team is shit

This shit really is getting out of hands I can't do 1 bot game without having at least 1 of those useless suicidal waste of space in my team.
In my last game I ended up with 4 of those and let me tell you it wasn't pretty. The brand mid ended up 21/0 and those fuckers were even on other lanes meaning that they were almost ALL fed; my entire team was doing 0/5-10. So despite doing 24/3 the mid and top got destroyed and in the end I lost to a base race while those broken toasters were almost all mid still doing nothing.

none of them replied when i said "if you are not a bot reply to this message". They played like regular new people but i could tell they were bots due to the slight and consistent pause between each action that applied to all of them

I leveled a new account after I was ban for 14 days for calling someone a few names.
I leveled in Bots all the way. Chance vs XP vs lower XP was to high.

So I leveled in bots. 

I had the same issue. A feeder bot. If I called middle the bot would ping like a mad man about getting out of the lane.
Then go into die. And do it over and over.

They really need to start stopping this bots vsing bots.

Bots are a real issue in low level ARAMs as well as co-op vs ai games (especially intermediate).

Riot do know about the bots in aram and co-op vs ai games. They cant do anything about it unless these bots are consistently getting reported. At the end of game screen, report them under "cheating", because it is a script they are running.

Remember, every report counts! ♥

Like Niji said, it isn't Riot doing this. It's people levelling accounts/IP farming to sell the accounts.
